016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.handlebars.helpers;
017
018import com.github.jknack.handlebars.ValueResolver;
019
020import java.util.Collections;
021import java.util.Map;
022import java.util.Optional;
023import java.util.Set;
024
025/**
026 * Support for Optional values
027 */
028public class OptionalValueResolver
029    implements ValueResolver
030{
031    public static final ValueResolver INSTANCE = new OptionalValueResolver();
032
033    @Override
034    public Object resolve(Object context, String name) {
035        return ValueResolver.UNRESOLVED;
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public Object resolve(Object context) {
040        if (context instanceof Optional optional)
041        {
042            return optional.orElse(null);
043        } else
044        {
045            return ValueResolver.UNRESOLVED;
046        }
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public Set<Map.Entry<String, Object>> propertySet(Object context) {
051        return Collections.emptySet();
052    }
053}
